#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,n;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&n);
        int a[n+1],k,flag=0,time=0,bullet=6;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%d",&a[i]);
        }
        sort(a,a+n);
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            //cout<<a[i]-time<<endl;
            if(bullet==0)
            {
                time++;
                bullet=6;
            }
            if((a[i]-time)<=0)
            {
                flag=1;
                k=i;
                //cout<<i<<endl;
                break;
            }
            bullet--;
            time++;
        }
        if(flag==1)
        {
            printf("Killed %d\n",k);
        }
        else
        {
            printf("Bhai Ho!\n");
        }
    }
}
